nodes.goal: Isolate variable x on one side of the equation
nodes.plan: Subtract 2x from both sides and subtract 6 from both sides to get all x terms on one side and constants on the other.

nodes.goal: Simplify both sides of the equation by combining like terms after isolating x
nodes.plan: Combine 4x - 2x to get 2x and then subtract 6 from both sides.

nodes.goal: Solve for x by dividing both sides of the equation by its coefficient
nodes.plan: Divide both sides by 2 to solve for x.
